评论概述: Comfy Enough Lounge Set, but Not My Favorite – A Few Tweaks Could Make It Better!
评论详情: This lounge set is… fine. It’s the kind of outfit you grab when all your other comfies are in the wash and you’re just trying to get through the day without feeling like a total slob. The material isn’t exactly buttery soft; it’s more like that “I’m trying, but not quite there” kind of fabric. Not scratchy, but not that cozy feel you really want to live in, you know?  And can we talk about the pants? The fit is just meh—like, they’re not terrible, but they’re definitely not doing me any favors. I really wish it had a thicker waistband instead of this thin elastic situation that just screams, “I gave up.” It’s the kind of waistband that rolls down every time you sit, which is exactly what a busy mom doesn’t need.  Overall, it’s okay for lounging around the house, but it’s not my first pick. It gets the job done, but I’ll be reaching for my other sets first!
The fit runs big so you may want to size down. It is comfortable with a decent material and lightweight.

I'm really happy with these pants! The material feels great, and the fit is just right, not too tight or loose. It’s well-made and seems durable enough to really last, which is a big plus. I love how versatile it is, working well for both casual lounge and still school or work appropriate. My daughter has gotten compliments on it already and will definitely be adding similar ones!
super cute and comfortable set. I would purchase again in more colors.
Bought this for the plane ride, cute and comfortable launders well
I love the way this fits and looks. It’s so soft and will be my favorite jammies.

The PRETTYGARDEN fall 2-piece set arrived fast and in a well packaged airtight bag for freshness. Upon opening there was no damage noticed. There is not a weird chemical smell that some articles of clothing sometimes arrive with and the fabric is really soft. The shirt matches the pants exactly, as I ordered the army green color, and it is accurately pictured in the description of the listing. The sizing is adequate, I normally wear a medium and I chose to order a large size so that the fit was loose but fitted so it's more comfortable around the weights and laying around the house. The fabric of the bottoms feels slightly different than the material of the top but not super noticeable, as I assume the bottoms would be thicker. I did not notice any shrinkage in the laundry, but I did not run through the dryer on high heat. I washed in cold water and air fluffed because I did not want to risk shrinking.
